::Prowl::

Prowl took Firedrill's hand, but it slipped out of his as Firedrill 
collapsed. Prowl sighs, looking at the horizon. He knew that the CF 
had launched a shuttle a few seconds after he had sent the 
transmission. Soon, the shuttle would be here.

Prowl looks down at his wrist compartment, opening it with a mental 
command and taking out the energy nunchuks. They quickly combine into 
a staff, Prowl reaching down so that the end was up against 
Firedrill's chest. The staff humms slightly, transferring enough 
power into Firedrill to keep his energy within functional parameters.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> The robot strugled to stand up, and weakly gurgled some sounds, 
then spat
> up some fuel, "Sorry" he said, and then put out his hand, in a 
gesture of
> friendship, "Thanks" he said, to Prowls response on his friends. "I 
am
> Fire.. I am Fire. huhhh" he murmured as he colapsed, and his 
computer began
> to speak, "Unit Firedrill, is in stasis lock, due to energon 
depletion".
